description: The Licence Holder shall ensure that at all times during the period from the commencement to the completion of the works authorised by this <<licence/letter>> the flow of the inland water immediately upstream of the works shall be released immediately downstream of the works undiminished in quantity or quality. <<This shall be carried out in accordance with the works detailed with the dated drawings numbered <<drawing no.>> <<and method statement number <<no.>>, dated <<date>>>> attached to this <<licence/letter>>>>.
